item.description: South Cloverdale Interchange at US-101/CA-128 in Cloverdale. Use US-101 South to San Francisco; US-101 North to Eureka.

item.description: Entering Sunnyvale on US-101 north.

item.title: US-101 North - Exit 394
item.description: US-101 north at Exit 394 - Lawrence Expressway.

item.title: US-101 North at OR-38 East
item.description: US-101 north at OR-38 to Drain, and Eugene. OR-38 follows the Umpqua River east from Reedsport.

item.title: US-101 North at East Bay Drive
item.description: US-101 north at East Bay Drive to Glasgow and Kentuck Inlet. Continue north on US-101 for Reedsport.

item.title: US-101 North - North Bend
item.description: US-101 North (Sheridan Ave.) merging back onto Sherman Ave as a two way street. Merge left to continue on US-101 for Reedsport and Florence.

item.title: US-101 North (Sheridan Ave.) at OR-540 (Virginia Ave.)
item.description: US-101 North (Sheridan Ave.) at OR-540 (Virginia Ave.) west to Charleston and State Parks. Continue north on US-101 for Reedsport and Florence.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching OR-540
item.description: US-101 North approaching OR-540 west to Charleston and State Parks. Continue north on US-101 to Florence and Reedsport.

item.title: US-101 North - Beaver Hill Road
item.description: US-101 north at Beaver Hill Road to South Slough Reserve State Parks and Charleston.

item.title: US-101 North - Coos County
item.description: Entering Coos County on US-101 north.

item.title: US-101 North - Curry County
item.description: Entering Curry County on US-101 north. Many Oregon counties, especially in western Oregon have graphics on the county line signs.

item.title: US-101 North - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-101 north at the California line.

item.title: US-101 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-101 north. Distance to Smith River, Oregon (state line), and Portland. Portland is not located along US-101.

item.title: US-101 North at CA-197
item.description: US-101 north at CA-197. CA-197 follows the Smith River east to US-199. It is a quicker route to reach US-199 when coming from Oregon.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching CA-197
item.description: US-101 North approaching CA-197 in Del Norte County.

item.title: US-101 North - Redwood Highway
item.description: US-101 North is signed as Redwood Highway from the north side of the Golden Gate Bridge, to the junction with US-199. The Redwood Highway then follows US-199 into Oregon ending at Grants Pass.

item.title: US-101 North - Parkway Dr./Washington Blvd. Jct.
item.description: US-101 North at Parkway Dr./Washington Blvd. Jct. in Crescent City. Southbound traffic, has an actual ramp and exit number for Washington Blvd. Freeway begins north of this intersection.

item.title: Cooper Ave. at US-101
item.description: Cooper Ave. at US-101 in Crescent City.

item.title: US-101 North at US-199/Grants Pass
item.description: US-101 north to Oregon Coast at US-199 to I-5 and Grants Pass. The is the end of the freeway for US-101 northbound.

item.title: US-101 South - Crescent City
item.description: US-101 South - Entering Crescent City. Crescent City is the county seat of Del Norte County.

item.title: US-101 South - Exit 791
item.description: US-101 south approaching Exit 791 - Washington Blvd.

item.title: US-199 West Approaching US-101
item.description: US-199 west approaching US-101. Use US-101 north for the Oregon Coast. Use US-101 south for Crescent City. There is no direct connection to US-101 north from US-199 west. Traffic follows the Elk Valley Cross Road to reach US-101. This is the western terminus of US-199.

item.title: US-199 South Approaching Elk Valley Cross Road
item.description: US-199 South approaching Elk Valley Cross Road junction. Use Elk Valley Cross Road for US-101 north to the Oregon Coast. There is not a direct ramp from US-199 south to US-101 north.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching US-101
item.description: US-20 west approaching US-101, its western terminus. US-20 starts in Boston, Massachusetts, and at 3365 miles is the longest route in the United States.

item.title: End OR-126 West at US-101
item.description: End OR-126 west at US-101. Turn right for US-101 north to Yachats and Newport; turn left for US-101 south to Reedsport and Coos Bay.

item.title: End OR-126 West Approaching US-101
item.description: End OR-126 west approaching US-101 in Florence.

item.title: OR-126 West Approaching US-101
item.description: OR-126 west approaching US-101. Turn right for US-101 north.

item.title: US-101 South - Exit 19A
item.description: US-101 south at Exit 19A - I-405/Sacramento/Santa Monica. Continue south on US-101 for (Downtown) Los Angeles.

item.title: US-101 South - Exits 19B and 19A
item.description: US-101 south approaching Exit 19B - Haskell Ave and Exit 19A - I-405/Sacramento/Santa Monica. Continue south on US-101 for (Downtown) Los Angeles.

item.title: Las Virgenes Road North at US-101
item.description: Las Virgenes Road North at US-101. Use US-101 south for Los Angeles; US-101 north for Ventura.

item.title: US-101 North - Exits 27A and 27B
item.description: US-101 north at Exit 27A - CA-27 North/Topanga Canyon Blvd and Exit 27B - CA-27 South/Topanga Canyon Blvd.

item.title: I-405 South - Exit 63B
item.description: I-405 south approaching Exit 63B - US-101/Ventura/Los Angeles. Continue south on I-405 for Santa Monica and Los Angeles Airport.

item.title: I-405 South Approaching Exit 63B
item.description: I-405 south approaching Exit 63B - US-101/Ventura Freeway/Ventura/Los Angeles. Continue south on I-405 south for Santa Monica and LA Airport.

item.title: US-101 North - Tillamook
item.description: US-101 north in Tillamook. This section of US-101 through Tillamook is a one-way couplet. Stay in right lanes to continue on US-101 north.

item.title: US-101 North at OR-6
item.description: US-101 north at OR-6 east. Turn right on OR-6 to Forest Grove and Portland. Continue north on US-101 to Bay City, Astoria, and Netarts. Also use OR-6 west for the Fairgrounds.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching OR-6
item.description: US-101 North approaching OR-6 east.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching OR-131
item.description: US-101 north approaching OR-131 west to Netarts. Use left lane for OR-131.

item.title: US-101 North at Blaine Road Jct.
item.description: US-101 north at Blaine Road jct. Continue ahead for Blaine Road and Upper Nestucca River Recreation Area. Turn left for US-101 north to Tillamook and Astoria.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-101 north approaching OR-22. Turn right for OR-22 east to McMinnville and Valley Junction. Turn left for US-101 north to Tillamook and Astoria. Also use OR-22 for the Hebo Ranger District of the Siuslaw National Forest.

item.title: End OR-18 West at US-101
item.description: End OR-18 west at US-101. Merge right for US-101 to Tillamook and Astoria.

item.title: OR-18 West Approaching US-101
item.description: OR-18 west approaching US-101. Use US-101 for Lincoln City and Tillamook. This is the western end of OR-18.

item.title: US-101 South - Exits 451B and 451A
item.description: US-101 south at Exit 451B - I-580/Richmond Bridge/Oakland. Approaching Exit 451A - Andersen Drive/Francisco Blvd. This is the western end of I-580.

item.title: US-101 South - Exits 451B and 451A
item.description: US-101 south at Exit 451B - I-580/Richmond Bridge/Oakland. Approaching Exit 451A - Andersen Drive/Francisco Blvd. US-101 continues south towards San Francisco.

item.title: 4th St. East at US-101 South
item.description: 4th St. east at US-101 South to San Francisco and Oakland. This is the Exit 452 onramp.

item.title: End CA-37 West at US-101
item.description: End CA-37 west at US-101. US-101 continues south for San Rafael and San Francisco. Exit right for Novato Blvd.

item.title: CA-37 West at US-101
item.description: CA-37 west at US-101. Use US-101 north for Santa Rosa and Eureka. Use US-101 south for San Rafael and San Francisco. Also approaching the Novato Blvd. exit. US-101 marks the western end of CA-37.

item.title: CA-37 West - Hanna Ranch Road Exit
item.description: CA-37 west at Hanna Ranch Road exit. Approaching US-101. Use US-101 north for Santa Rosa and Eureka. Use US-101 south for San Rafael and San Francisco.

item.description: US-199 west approaching US-101. Use US-101 north for the Oregon Coast. Use US-101 south for Crescent City. There is no direct connection to US-101 north from US-199 west. Traffic follows the Elk Valley Cross Road to reach US-101. This is the western terminus of US-199.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 1C - Ninth St./Civic Center. Approaching Exit 1B - US-101 North/Golden Gate Bridge, and Exit 1A - US-101 South/San Jose. I-80 ends at US-101.

item.title: Begin US-30 at US-101 (Former Begin of US-26)
item.description: Begin US-30 at US-101 (Former Begin of US-26). Turn left for US-30 west to Astoria City Center; turn right to continue south on US-101 and for US-26 (Former) to Seaside. The new starting point of US-26 is in Seaside.

item.title: US-101 North at OR-18
item.description: US-101 North at OR-18 East to Salem and Portland. Continue north on US-101 to Tillamook and Astoria. The US-101 shield is incorrectly using the state highway shield style.

item.title: US-101 South Approaching US-30 (and Former US-26)
item.description: US-101 south approaching US-30 and (Former)US-26. Use US-30 east to Astoria; use US-101/(Former) US-26 to Seaside. US-26 currently ends in Seaside, but used to follow US-101 north to the US-101/US-30 junction in Astoria.
